title: I don't want to lane.
body: I just want to jungle, and don't care if I'd have to wait half an hour for every match, can we make it happen?

replies.body: I truly wish that they made an option for this. I just want to Support. I can wait the 2 or 3 extra minutes in order to be guaranteed Support rather than sometimes having to fill roles that I don't like playing.

You're not very good at reading, are you? How did you read my post and come to the conclusion that I was claiming to be better than professional players? Were you assuming that I was claiming that I could play more than one role really well? No, that was not the case, no one in my elo can play any role really well. Work on your reading comprehension son. Take a few classes or something.

I am pretty sure that Dyrus is better at his worst role than I am at my best.

But if Dyrus is challenger level as a top laner but only diamond as any other role (this isn't actually the case by the way, he's a competent jungler by challenger standards IIRC) then he's not on the same level as a player who is challenger level in more than one role.

I am at the least basicly proficient at all roles except mid, I carried myself to gold supporting/jungling in season 4, I carried myself to gold in season 5 playing adc (sadly I tilted back down to silver after that) and this season I will carry myself to plat playing jungle/top. So essentially the only role I don't at all feel confident playing is mid. Doesn't change the fact that I just don't like laning and wouldn't if I didn't have to. 

Jungling speaks to me, jungling sings to me, I just wanna jungle.

This sounds fine, but remember: you're not just raising your queue times by doing this, you're raising everyone else's queue times, too. While I have no strong opinion on the idea, queue times for high MMR are bad enough as is.

I mean, alot of people just dodge at the very last second if they dont get their role, trollingin champ select in hopes of baiting someone else into doing it. Thats about 3 minutes of 9 peoples times every time it happens, and lets face it, we all know it happens.

Especially that jackass who picks Fill, gets support, and then picks {{champion:41}} support because top lane wont swap.
I have literally never seen that happen.
I find it hard to believe that in 3 and a half months you have never been trolled in champ select.

I've had some people complain that they didn't get the role they wanted, but other than that, the only problems I've had with new champ select was someone trying to ban Jhin from me when he first came out.

When you get to pretty high elo, alot of people want bot, and no one wants top, but in lower elos people just straight up dont want to jungle and just want to top and bot. Its odd that mid and support are so consistent while the others just kinda bounce around.

Jungle main here, just put mid as your secondary since it's the most popular role, you'll get jungle like 99% of the time.
